name: Girls and Tests
description: Try to find out what Mariah and Sonya like! In this short game you'll need to answer the questions of these two girls. Each girl has certain character, so be careful, answering the questions. If you're lucky and answered correct to all of them, then girls, probably, will have something to say or show!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Pentium 4 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Pentium 4 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip Storage: 500 MB available space
